body_html:
I have the same problem when I use KerasClassifier and GridSearchCV for tuning the parameters.

System information

  • OS: Linux 4.13.3-1-ARCH
  • TensorFlow: 1.3.0
  • Scikit-learn: 0.19.0
  • Keras: 2.0.8
  • Python: 3.6.2
  • GPU: GeForce GTX 1080 Ti
  • CUDA/cuDNN: release 8.0, V8.0.61

Code example

model = KerasClassifier(build_fn=create_model, verbose=0, epochs=20, batch_size=1)
optimizer = ['SGD', 'Adagrad', 'Adam']
param_grid = dict(optimizer=optimizer)
grid = GridSearchCV(estimator=model, param_grid=param_grid, n_jobs=-1)

body:
I have the same problem when I use KerasClassifier and GridSearchCV for tuning the parameters.

**System information**

- OS: Linux 4.13.3-1-ARCH
- TensorFlow: 1.3.0
- Scikit-learn: 0.19.0
- Keras: 2.0.8
- Python: 3.6.2
- GPU: GeForce GTX 1080 Ti
- CUDA/cuDNN: release 8.0, V8.0.61

**Code example**

`model = KerasClassifier(build_fn=create_model, verbose=0, epochs=20, batch_size=1)`
`optimizer = ['SGD', 'Adagrad', 'Adam']`
`param_grid = dict(optimizer=optimizer)`
`grid = GridSearchCV(estimator=model, param_grid=param_grid, n_jobs=-1)`
